message.name: ERR_FC_DELIVERYMETHOD_EMPTY
message.locale: Unable to create a financial component record due to blank delivery method for case reference "%1s".

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_CATEGORY_INVALID
message.locale: The category code on the financial component is not a recognised category and cannot be processed.
The category code on the financial component is not a recognized category and cannot be processed.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_COVER_PERIOD_INVALID
message.locale: There is no payment cover period type specified on the financial component.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_REPMT_TYPE_INVALID
message.locale: The specified liability case type cannot have repayments associated with it.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED
message.locale: Financial component not processed. An email was sent to inform the owner of the problems.

message.name: ERR_ILIREL_FV_REL_TYPE_INVALID
message.locale: There is no line item relationship type for the specified financial component type.

message.name: ERR_RECOUPMENT_FV_METHOD_INVALID
message.locale: The method of type "%1s" is not supported for the category type of "%2s".

message.name: INF_CASE_FAILED_REASSESS
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s failed eligibility reassessment.

message.name: INF_REASSESS_FAIL_NO_INSTR
message.locale: The Case %1s of type %2s for %3s failed the eligibility test prior to instrument generation. The Financial components for the case were expired to prevent wrongful processing. The case requires attention so that an instrument may be generated.

message.name: INF_REPMT_FC_EXPIRED
message.locale: The repayment financial component has been expired. The liability is not repaid in full so the repayment schedule must be re-created.

message.name: INF_REPMT_FC_NO_RELATED_FC
message.locale: The repayment financial component "%1s" could not be processed, as it is not related to a product delivery component from which the repayment can be deducted.

message.name: ERR_FCRELATION_RNFE_UTILITYPMT
message.locale: No financial component relationship exists from the current utility payment financial component.

message.name: INF_FC_UNCERTIFIED_PAYMENTCASE_SUB
message.locale: A payment has been made on case %1s - Not certified.

message.name: INF_FC_UNCERTIFIED_PAYMENTCASE_TXT
message.locale: The case %1s was not certified but a PrePayment was required and therefore issued. Any deductions due from this payment were not made.

message.name: INF_CASE_FC_EXPIRED
message.locale: No payments will be made on case %1s of type %2s for %3s as the financial component has expired.

message.name: INF_CASE_FC_COMPEXPIRED
message.locale: Financial component on case %1s has expired.
